message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking of a price closer to $8000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Bob, I understand your concern about the price, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $8000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between our original offer and your counteroffer. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $9000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8500?

Hi Bob, I understand you're still a bit above your budget, but I'm not willing to go all the way down to $8500. I'm willing to make another concession, but I need to make sure I'm still getting a good deal. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $8750.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $8500?
